title: Ceremonial Hanging (Palepai)
artistDisplayName:
Paminggir people
Lampung area, South Sumatra, Indonesia
medium: Cotton, silk, and silver-leaf-over-lacquered-paper-strip-wrapped bast fiber (probably ramie), plain weave with supplementary patterning and brocading wefts, main warp fringe
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of E. M. Bakwin Indonesian Textile Collection
